title: Irma Vep
description: René Vidal’s unfinished reimagining of Louis Feuillade’s silent serial film Les Vampires focusing on Irma Vep, the mistress of vampires.
altHero: black and white film: a woman in a leather catsuit and a ski mask walks up a flight of stairs
alt1: closeup of the woman in the ski mask
alt2: a man stands with the woman unmasked, a beautiful Asian woman
alt3: a blurry shot of the masked woman running across a rooftop, scribbley asterisks are composited on top
alt4: a blurry closeup of the woman with rows of black circles superimposed over her eyes
